Hierarch Asterios:
It all started after the bloody rain. If You come here, you must be heard the name Shillien?
I heard about the heavenly light, guarding Magold, and came here in search of funds to rescue the Tree of Life. But then revived Ruler Awakened Troubles Agael, and all struck the Corruptive Darkness.
But I still have hope.
Will you help me? Perhaps healing the Tree of Life, we will be able to stop The darkness engulfing the world.
